text:
盗んだ物?
私は何も
持ち出して
ないわよ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 11.40%;top: 3.89%;width: 9.67%;height: 8.21%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
壁から
無くなった
バンダー
スナッチの頭
を被ってるな
style: font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 23.21%;top: 2.84%;width: 11.46%;height: 9.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
エコーは
ああ言ったが
壁の悪魔達は
実在しない
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 47.20%;top: 2.09%;width: 12.05%;height: 9.64%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
だが
本当の謎は
そこじゃ
ない
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 72.73%;top: 2.92%;width: 9.43%;height: 7.96%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
問題は
何をしたか
じゃない
何故かだ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 80.13%;top: 8.79%;width: 11.46%;height: 8.30%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
エコーは
頭の発見時に
笑ってた。
皆 変装を疑わず
ビビは名を間違えた。
ブランディなんて
いないのに
皆何かの理由で
隠してる
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 12.47%;top: 34.86%;width: 17.54%;height: 15.42%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
私は色んな人と
キスしてるの
style: font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #BFBFBF;left: 37.17%;top: 44.67%;width: 14.32%;height: 2.51%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: #BFBFBF;left: 45.29%;top: 47.10%;width: 8.35%;height: 1.51%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;font-weight: normal;

text:
恐らく
体を奪う
悪魔だろう…
寄生したか
仲間が被害者を
差し出したか
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 77.15%;top: 35.03%;width: 16.11%;height: 13.16%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
どっちにしろ、
この謎解きは
リンゴのようにオレをハメる
計画のようだな
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 78.58%;top: 48.02%;width: 14.20%;height: 9.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 68.20%;top: 57.99%;width: 8.83%;height: 6.20%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
皆は
自己紹介したのにお前は本のジャンル
言ってないよな
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 13.78%;top: 63.95%;width: 15.04%;height: 12.66%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: normal;

text:
ミステリー
小説よ、
もちろん
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 38.72%;top: 67.38%;width: 11.81%;height: 7.12%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: bold;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 85.62%;top: 88.34%;width: 6.21%;height: 4.36%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;font-weight: bold;
